name: DH:IGDC Character Creator Challenge
description:
Not only is this my very first Game Dev Challenge I have completed for the "Distinguished Humans: Indie Game Dev Club", it's the first Unity project I have EVER completed and published. It's not much, but what a rush to have it out in the world. The first of what promises to be great things!

Want to join the club and get in on the action. Head over to thetallesttowergames.com and check us out. You can also find our podcast on all of the major platforms. Just search "Distinguished Humans: Indie Game Dev Club".
Here's our latest episode where I talk about this challenge:
